memberdef.type: std::function< void(const juce::AudioBuffer< float > &, const juce::var &midiData, int bpm, const juce::String &key, const juce::StringArray &genres)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<void(const juce::AudioBuffer<float>&, const juce::var& midiData, int bpm, const juce::String& key, const juce::StringArray& genres)> StoryRecordingComponent::onRecordingComplete
memberdef.name: onRecordingComplete

briefdescription.para: StoryRecordingComponent provides UI for recording short music clips (stories) with MIDI visualization support (7.5.3.1.1).

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
Record button with 60-second countdown
MIDI activity indicator (shows when MIDI is being captured)
Waveform preview during recording
Duration display with countdown (max 60 seconds)
Auto-stop at 60 seconds
Minimum 5 seconds required before stop enabled
Stories are short music clips (5-60 seconds) that expire after 24 hours. They can include MIDI data for piano roll visualization.
